dcterms:creator: Helen Yannakoudakis
Aistein E Andersen
Ardeshir Geranpayeh
Ted Briscoe
Diane Nicholls
dcterms:description: A publicly-released set of essays written by non-native learners of English taking a language assessment exam. Each essay is annotated by professional annotators with the spans of language errors committed, the types of errors, and suggested corrections.
dcterms:title: The First Certificate in English (FCE)

dcterms:creator: Hwee Tou Ng
Siew Mei Wu
Ted Briscoe
Christian Hadiwinoto
Raymond Hendy Susanto
Christopher Bryant
dcterms:description: A dataset of English essays written by advanced undergraduate students at the National University of Singapore, annotated with error corrections.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2014 shared task on GEC

dcterms:creator: Courtney Napoles
Keisuke Sakaguchi
Joel Tetreault
dcterms:description: A fluency corpus and benchmark for grammatical error correction, containing essays written by a range of English learners with varying proficiency levels.
dcterms:title: Johns Hopkins University (JHU) FLuency-Extended GUG Corpus

dcterms:creator: Christopher Bryant
Mariano Felice
Aistein E Andersen
Ted Briscoe
dcterms:description: A collection of texts written by learners of English of varying levels of proficiency, submitted for assessment to the Write & Improve system.
dcterms:title: Cambridge English Write & Improve (W&I) corpus

dcterms:creator: Sylviane Granger
dcterms:description: A corpus originally compiled at the Centre for English Corpus Linguistics, comprising essays written by native English students.
dcterms:title: LOCNESS corpus
